sub_title: Interim CHRO-HR Director-SR HR Project Manager-Labour Law Specialist-Mediator-Gets the work done- Work Council Coach-Teamplayer- No Bullshit-People Manager-Motivator-Hands on
summary:
INVEST IN THE WELL-BEING OF YOUR EMPLOYEES. THE TIME AND THE NEED ARE THERE.
This investment will lead to greater involvement of your employees, lower turnover and absenteeism and a better working atmosphere. Happy employees. Your clients will also benefit from this! A culture in which every employee feels at home, in which every employee is seen and has their own qualities. And yes, your investment leads to the growth of your organization, lower costs of staff and to prosperity for all. In the end, people make the whole difference! Let's be proactive. Let's not wait until the staff numbers are disappointing (high turnover, high absenteeism, low involvement e.g.), the staff costs become too high and action is required. Because you will be too late. With this tight labor market, this is not an option. Curious how to achieve this within your company? Which investment is needed for you? Let's connect.

My applicable keywords are - copy /paste the feedback received during one of my last assignments : 
P (Perceptive, Personable, Positive)
E (Eager, Empathic, Energizing)
O (Observant, Optimist, Open - Minded)
P (Passion, Power, Principles)
L (Likable, Learning, Loves People)
E (Expert, Employees, Extrovert)

treasury_media.title: HRM Advies MKB - medium and large sized enterprises
treasury_media.description: Invest in the well-being of your employees. It will lead to greater involvement of your employees, lower turnover and absenteeism and a great working atmosphere. It will lead to the growth of your organization, lower costs of staff and to prosperity for all. Let’s not wait until the staff numbers are disappointing (high turnover, high absenteeism, low involvement e.g.), the staff costs become too high. Curious how to achieve this? Which investment is needed for you? Let's connect.

profile_positions.description:
Kader is a consultancy in Health, Environment,Safety & Quality.

Responsibilities:
- drafting & implementing the vision of HR  & Recruitment together with the team
- digitize the tools within Recruitment & HR
- ensure that HR analytics are available and used 
- harmonise the labour conditions of 3 entities within the Group
- improve Labour Market communication in close cooperation with Marketing
- part of the MT
- manage & coach the team of 6 professionals

profile_positions.description:
Adnamics, the optimiser of the hospitality industry. They provide insight, think up an effective approach and deliver measurable results for all clients in the food service industry or related to the food service industry.

- To optimise the applicable Employees Handbook and Labor Contracts in line with applicable Law and legislation;
- To develop and implement Performance Management 2.0. by using the right HCM.
profile_positions.title: Senior HR Project Manager & Labour Law

profile_positions.description:
MSD is one of the largest and most diverse pharmaceutical companies in the Netherlands, with offices in Haarlem, Oss and MSD Animal Health Boxmeer (veterinary). The Dutch branch is also one of the largest components of parent company Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, NJ, USA. which is located in the United States.

Responsibilities:
- To act as Sounding Board for the Working Council of MSD in Oss.
profile_positions.title: Labour Law Counsel and Sparring Partner for the Working Council

profile_positions.description:
Wereldhave invests in full-service centers that contribute to a better everyday life for the communities where we operate. The centers within our portfolio are dominant in their micro environment in larger regional cities in The Netherlands, Belgium and France. We focus on centres where shopping, leisure, food & experience can easily be combined. 

Responsibilities:
- To draft the HRM strategy which agree with the strategy, the ambition and the culture of the organization in order to achieve the set goals for the coming years.
profile_positions.title: Senior HR Project Manager & Labour Law

profile_positions.description:
ACT Commodities is one of the world’s leading trading houses in the worldwide environmental commodity markets. Founded in 2009 as one of the first companies to pursue this market, we are now one of the largest specialist firms for trading carbon emissions, biofuels, renewable energy, and energy efficiency. This is complemented with widespread activity in the oil and petroleum markets, which expand our scope covering the intertwined world of energy and fuel commodities.

ACT Commodities is headquartered in Amsterdam and also operates out of New York City. From these two locations we serve more than 4,000 customers all over the world, helping companies achieve environmental compliance, meet voluntary environmental goals and trade (bio)fuels and feedstocks. Certificates and physical products are traded by our highly knowledgeable and service-oriented team, whose independent position in the market facilitates an unbiased consultative approach.

Responsibilities:
- Advice on Organization and HRM  issues.
profile_positions.title: Senior HR Project Manager & Labour Law
